original_text: I also found out that the portions of the Levites had not been given to them, so that the Levites and the singers, who did the work, had fled each to his field.
korean_text: 내가 또 알아본즉 레위 사람들이 받을 몫을 주지 아니하였으므로 그 직무를 행하는 레위 사람들과 노래하는 자들이 각각 자기 밭으로 도망하였기로

sentences.original_text: that the portions of the Levites had not been given to them
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들에게 몫이 주어지지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: so that the Levites and the singers
had fled each to his field
